column5: Anybody have any experience fishing at West Hawk Lake . Planning to camp there in early June for a few days , any tips would be apreciated . I'll have my boat with me , kind of focusing on bass , any info would be helpfull .

In spring I would only fish for lake trout years ago. I do know this that the water will be very cold still. Big and very deep lake with a shore line that drops off very fast in the main body of water. I'm not much of a smallie fisherman, but in the very north part of the lake is much more shallow and with channels and islands. It should warm up faster.
